description: A markup/discount that is defined for a specific set of services that can later be associated with a pricing plan.

Arn.markdownDescription:
Pricing rule ARN

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:pricingrule/[a-zA-Z0-9]{10}  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
Pricing rule name

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
Pricing rule description

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 1024   

Update requires: No interruption

Scope.description: A term used to categorize the granularity of a Pricing Rule.
Scope.markdownDescription:
A term used to categorize the granularity of a Pricing Rule.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: One of MARKUP or DISCOUNT that describes the direction of the rate that is applied to a pricing plan.
Type.markdownDescription:
One of MARKUP or DISCOUNT that describes the direction of the rate that is applied to a pricing plan.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

ModifierPercentage.markdownDescription:
Pricing rule modifier percentage

---

Required: No

Type: number     

Update requires: No interruption

Service.description: The service which a pricing rule is applied on
Service.markdownDescription:
The service which a pricing rule is applied on

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9\.\-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

AssociatedPricingPlanCount.description: The number of pricing plans associated with pricing rule
AssociatedPricingPlanCount.markdownDescription:
The number of pricing plans associated with pricing rule

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.description: Creation timestamp in UNIX epoch time format
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
Creation timestamp in UNIX epoch time format

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

LastModifiedTime.description: Latest modified timestamp in UNIX epoch time format
LastModifiedTime.markdownDescription:
Latest modified timestamp in UNIX epoch time format

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
